content:
DispatchWrapper Class

Definition

Wraps objects the marshaler should marshal as a VT_DISPATCH.

In this Article

[System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComVisible(true)]
public sealed class DispatchWrapper
Inheritance
System.Object
DispatchWrapper

Inherited Members

Equals(Object)
Equals(Object,Object)
GetHashCode()
GetType()
MemberwiseClone()
ReferenceEquals(Object,Object)
ToString()

Remarks

Use to wrap objects the marshaler should marshal as a VT_DISPATCH. This wrapper will force objects to be marshaled out as VT_DISPATCH. If the object does not support IDispatch then an exception will be thrown. 

    void MyMethod(Object^ o);

    void DoWrap()
    {
        Object^ o = gcnew MyObject();
        MyMethod(o);                        // passes o as VT_UNKNOWN
        MyMethod(gcnew DispatchWrapper(o)); // passes o as VT_DISPATCH

        //...
    }

    void MyMethod(Object o);

    public void DoWrap()
    {
        Object o = new MyObject();
        MyMethod(o);                      // passes o as VT_UNKNOWN
        MyMethod(new DispatchWrapper(o)); // passes o as VT_DISPATCH

        //...
    }

    Sub MyMethod(o As Object)
        ' handle object ...
    End Sub

    Public Sub DoWrap()
        Dim o As Object = new MyObject()
        MyMethod(o)                      ' passes o as VT_UNKNOWN
        MyMethod(new DispatchWrapper(o)) ' passes o as VT_DISPATCH

        '...
    End Sub

For more information on VT_DISPATCH, please see the existing documentation for VARENUM::VT_DISPATCH in the MSDN library.

Constructors

DispatchWrapper(Object)

Initializes a new instance of the DispatchWrapper class with the object being wrapped.

public DispatchWrapper (object obj);
obj
System.Object

The object to be wrapped and converted to VarEnum.

Exceptions
ArgumentException

obj is not a class or an array.

-or-

obj does not support IDispatch.

InvalidOperationException

The obj parameter was marked with a ComVisibleAttribute attribute that was passed a value of false.

-or-

The obj parameter inherits from a type marked with a ComVisibleAttribute attribute that was passed a value of false.

Properties

WrappedObject

Gets the object wrapped by the DispatchWrapper.

public object WrappedObject { get; }
Value
System.Object

The object wrapped by the DispatchWrapper.
